title: Girls Gone Wild Presents: Search for the Hottest Girl in America
overview: Girls Gone Wild Presents: Search for the Hottest Girl in America gives viewers a candid, behind-the-scenes look at Girls Gone Wild's nationwide campaign to find the cutest, sexiest, hottest girl in the country. The series takes viewers to America's hottest clubs, campuses and beaches to meet thousands of wild college girls who will compete to be voted "Hottest Girl in America". Viewers also get a peek inside the Girls Gone Wild offices, follow the exploits of company CEO Joe Francis, watch sexy photo shoots for Girls Gone Wild Magazine, and travel with bikini models to exotic Girls Gone Wild Island.
